name: Implementation of the GA4GH Sequence collection retrieval API

schema.description: A collection of sequences, representing biological sequences including nucleotide or amino acid sequences. For example, a sequence collection may represent the set of chromosomes in a reference genome, the set of transcripts in a transcriptome, a collection of reference microbial sequences of a specific gene, or any other set of sequences.

lengths.description: Number of elements, such as nucleotides or amino acids, in each sequence.

names.description: Human-readable identifiers of each sequence, commonly called chromosome names.

sequences.description: Digests of sequences computed using the GA4GH digest algorithm (sha512t24u).

md5_sequences.description: Digests of sequences computed using md5 digest algorithm.

sorted_name_length_pairs.description: Objects composed of length and name of a sequence digested and ordered lexicographically
